name: Coto island - the best adventure
description: If you are tired of crowded beaches like Do Son or Sam Son; then, the beaches of Coto island may be the ideal destination for your holidays. Still far off the beaten tourist path, the island remains its very natural beauty. Coto is one of the farthest inhabited islands from mainland, about 100km from Ha Long city. Tourists can reach the island on a high-speed boat for about 1.5 hours.
